name: Simulation 3D Alpha V1.00.00
description:
Hello and Welcome to the start of my journey as a 3D FPS game Developer, Remember this is only a prototype of the game which hopefully eventually will release as early as Spring (Autumn to the Aussies) 2024 on steam and other platforms. 

The Simulation 3D Alpha release, this is the one of many alpha updates before the first beta release, this means this game will not be perfect, completable, there will be bugs,  glitches and problems which will be fixed eventually but always remember be patient with the game,  designing a 3d fps game hoping to be able to release it to the best quality is hard and is challenging for just a single Developer.

Please Leave as much feedback as you can.

(The game might feel buggy and glitchy planning on fixing some bugs and glitches i have noticed very soon)

Controls:

W,A,S,D Moving and traversing around

Mouse 1 for shooting

Scroll wheel for switching weapons

Mouse for looking around

Alt tab,Alt esc or ctrl Alt Del for exiting

Thankyou for helping to make this game better

Please join the Discord, Patreon and YouTube Anything helps including spreading the word.

Discord: https://discord.gg/3DSz7BawBk (Not Finished)
